name: EcoNepal Store
description: EcoNepal Store offers a wide range of sustainable products including bamboo toothbrushes, reusable bags, and eco-friendly home essentials.

name: Green Earth Shop
description: Green Earth Shop promotes climate-friendly products like organic clothing, recycled paper goods, and green beauty products.

name: Sustainable Nepal
description: Sustainable Nepal provides eco-conscious products such as solar-powered gadgets, organic food, and eco-friendly packaging solutions.

name: Earth Friendly Goods
description: Earth Friendly Goods focuses on offering products that help reduce waste, including biodegradable items and sustainable kitchenware.
